entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Salmon Arm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salmon Arm 6:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: WNW 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:59 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers near noon. Snow level 600 metres rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:59 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers near midnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:59 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
